AccountMarkedForSuspiciousActivity: Your account has been flagged for suspicious activity so for your protection, withdrawals and deposits have been disabled. Please contact support@algopay.io to unlock your account.
AlgoPayDescription: AlgoPay is your personal e-wallet that lets you store and access your personal funds from anywhere.
AlgoUpwork: Did you know AlgoPay gives you job opportunities through UpWork?
AmountYouWillRecieve: This is the amount you will receive.
AreYouSureCancel: Are you sure you wish to cancel this transaction?
CannotChangeLater: Please ensure these fields are correct as they cannot be changed at this time.
ClickBelow: Click below to confirm that this is your name and photo.
ClickDeposit:
When you arrive, click “deposit” on the home page, follow the steps, and bring the amount in cash to the cashier. 
 
 They will scan your app to update your account balance.
ClickingConfirmsRequest: Clicking this confirms that you have fulfilled the customer's request.
ClickHereToReportSuspiciousActivity: Please click here to report suspicious activity.
ClickToTakePhoto: Tap here to upload a profile picture. Please make sure that your face is clearly visible. We also recommend taking the photo against a white background.
ClickWithdraw:
When you arrive, click “withdraw” on the home page, follow the steps, and show your app to the cashier. 
 
 They will scan your app to approve your cash withdrawal.
ConfirmDeposit: I confirm this is the amount I wish to deposit.
ConfirmIdentity: Yes, I confirm that is my name and photo.
ConfirmTransactionText: Click this button to confirm the exchange of funds and to complete the transaction.
ConfirmWithdraw: I confirm that this is the amount I wish to withdraw.
DepositNote: Note: This is the amount you *must* give to your Algo Vendor
EarnProjectsOnUpwork: Earn projects on UpWork and get paid directly into your AlgoPay account.
EmailUsUpwork: Email us at #freelance@algopay.io# to let us know you're interested!
ErrorScanningQRCode: Error scanning QR Code, please try again and make sure code is clearly visible. If the problem persists please contact AlgoPay support.
ExcitedToHaveYou: We're excited to have *you* on AlgoPay!
FirstTimeUser: Since this is your first time logging in, we'll need to collect a little more information.
HereAreSomeTips: Here are some tips for how to get started.
Loading: We're loading some stuff for you.
LogoutCustomerFirst: You are currently logged in as an AlgoPay customer, would you like to logout of your customer account?
LogoutVendorFirst: You are currently logged in as an AlgoPay vendor, would you like to logout of your vendor account?
OnlyAlgoPayAccountCanPickUp: Only AlgoPay account holders can pickup or deposit funds.
PasswordsDoNotMatch: Passwords do not match, please verify correct password.
PleaseEnterAlgoPassword: Please enter your Algo password to continue.
PresentCode: Present this code to the cashier.
ReadTermsAndConditions: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
StartUsingYourWallet: Visit an Algo Vendor to put money into your account.
TapToScan: Tap below to scan your AlgoPay code:
TakeOutExistingMoney: You can withdraw cash at any time by visiting your local Algo Vendor.
VendorDeclinedRequest: Your request was unable to be completed - if this continues to happen, please contact AlgoPay support.
VerifyUserPicture: Is this the user requesting to deposit or withdraw funds?
WithdrawNote: I confirm that this is the amount I wish to withdraw.
YouHaveCompletedTransaction: You've completed your transaction with {0}. Thanks for working hard!
YourHonestyMakesAlgoBetter: Your honesty makes the Algo community stronger.
UsersInYourArea:
Users in your area know to visit your store. 
 
  We recommend having your app nearby and logged in so that you’re ready to service them.
UsersWillHaveUniqueCode: Users will have a unique code for you to scan from your app. It looks like this:
NoCodeNoAlgoPay: If they do not have a code, they do not have an AlgoPay account.
AppWillAlwaysTellYouWhatToDo: Your app will always tell you what to do.
JustScanUsersCode:
Just scan the user’s code and follow the instructions. 
 
 Your app will let you know whether to take in or hand out cash, and what the total amount is.
